Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product comes with a wealth of features that can significantly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to you. We're offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $15000. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
